snippet.title: Gremlins, Inc. - official trailer - introducing the game [EN/DE/FR/RU/ES subs]
snippet.description:
Gremlins, Inc. is an intense strategy board game in a steampunk world of corrupt capitalist gremlins who compete for money, political power and prestige. Save and invest, steal and extort, arrest and get arrested – in single-player and multiplayer modes, with ranks and ladders.

http://store.steampowered.com/app/369990

******
